title: LFM for Ranked Teams
body:
Looking for members for my ranked team, the positions are currently available:

TOP
JUNGLE
MID
~~ADC~~
~~SUPPORT~~

This is a casual team looking to get up the leaderboards for 2016, must play frequently and be able to play multiple champions in their role, if you're interested then just chuck our leader an add :  "Beef and Chons"
Or leave a comment below, hope to see u on our team :)

replies.body:
Heyas,

My info :
Ingame Name : Katalize

Current Rank: G3
Highest Rank Achieved: G1

Top 5 Mid Champs:
Currently playing a lot : Brand / Veigar / Kayle / Cassio / Velkoz
Highly skilled on : Elise / Fizz / TF / katarina / LB / Zed

What do you want from a team:
I value team spirit, working on our mutual flaws together.
I expect my team members to be open to criticism as much as I am.
I am not a leader type, yet I expect to be able to give advice and strategic opinions, while being heard out.
I am looking to learn from other experienced and motivated players.

Rank 5s Experience:
I have played in a 5 teams in season 3, Australian player base on NA server. I was the mid laner and our compositions relied on CC / AOE such as Galio / Cho gath / Kennen / Vlad mid picks.
I haven't played in 5's ranked since then, mainly in 3s on Twisted treeline and solo/ duo queue on SR.
add me Itsgosu i main top jg add and play on wednesday from 8:30am-5:00pm est and sometimes on thursday
